evidence_extraction:
[
  "[Tribal Dominance: I'm one of the 22 million black victims of the Democrats. One of the 22 million black victims of the Republicans and one of the 22 million black victims of Americanism.]",
  "[Tribal Dominance: The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.]",
  "[Tribal Dominance: His gospel is white nationalism, our gospel is black nationalism.]",
  "[Individual Dignity: They just have slaves and people who are free! Well, this country is a hypocrite! They try and make you think they set you free by calling you a second-class citizen. No, you're nothing but a 20th century slave.]",
  "[Individual Dignity: If you black you were born in jail, in the North as well as the South.]",
  "[Individual Dignity: All she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.]",
  "[Fear: Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap. When a racial powder keg goes off, it doesn't care who it knocks out the way.]",
  "[Fear: We don't see any American dream. We've experienced only the American nightmare.]",
  "[Fear: I'm here to tell you in case you don't know it – that you got a new, you got a new generation of black people in this country who don't care anything whatsoever about odds.]",
  "[Hope: And it will take black nationalism to bring about the freedom of 22 million Afro-Americans, here in this country, where we have suffered colonialism for the past 400 years.]",
  "[Hope: The only way we're going to solve our problem is with a self-help program. Before we can get a self-help program started, we have to have a self-help philosophy. Black nationalism is a self-help philosophy.]",
  "[Hope: It's liberty or it's death. It's freedom for everybody or freedom for nobody.]",
  "[Envy: The white man, the white man is too intelligent to let someone else come and gain control of the economy of his community. But you will let anybody come in and control the economy of your community...]",
  "[Envy: The community in which you spend your money becomes richer and richer, the community out of which you take your money becomes poorer and poorer.]",
  "[Envy: The man who is controlling the stores in our community is a man who doesn't look like we do. He's a man who doesn't even live in the community.]",
  "['No direct quotes expressing joy from others\\' success.']",
  "[Enmity: Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.]",
  "[Enmity: All of us catch hell from the same enemy. We're all in the same bag, in the same boat.]",
  "[Enmity: He created the problem. He's the criminal! You don't take your case to the criminal, you take your criminal to court.]",
  "[Amity: We got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony.]",
  "[Amity: So today, though Islam is my religious philosophy, my political, economic and social philosophy is black nationalism. You and I – [applause] As I say, if we bring up religion, we'll have differences, we'll have arguments, and we'll never be able to get together.]",
  "[Amity: Join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community.]",
  "[Fragmentative Goals: The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.]",
  "[Fragmentative Goals: The economic philosophy of black nationalism only means that we should own and operate and control the economy of our community.]",
  "[Fragmentative Goals: I think that separation will get me freedom.]",
  "[Cohesive Goals: So our people not only have to be reeducated to the importance of supporting black business, but the black man himself has to be made aware of the importance of going into business.]",
  "[Cohesive Goals: Join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community.]",
  "[Cohesive Goals: We got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key.]"
]
